note.p: Geologist. Assistant curator, Museum of Practical Geology, 1860–76. Professor of natural science, Aberystwyth, 1876–9. Registrar, Royal School of Mines, 1879–80. Curator and librarian, Museum of Practical Geology, 1879–1902. FRS 1870.
Mineralogical magazine 17 (1916): 368–9, Quarterly Journal of the Geological Society of London 72 (1915): lviii–lix.
